live_updates: Our technicians continue to repair services through the night. We apologize for the extended disruption and thank you for your patience.
On-site technicians continue working diligently to resolve this outage.
Technicians are on site working to restore service as quickly as possible. No ETA at this time but we will continue to monitor the situation and provide updates when available.
Tech crews continue to work in the area to restore services.
Due to the complexity of this outage, our technicians are still working to resolve.
Technicians are on site working to resolve this issue.
Tech crews are on site working towards a resolution.
Technical crews are dispatched to arrive on site to investigate this matter.
Our teams are looking into it. Please stay tuned for updates.
42019.summary: Some customers in the Northwood area of Thunder Bay are experiencing an interruption to their Internet services. We are working to restore service as quickly as possible and apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.
42019.title: Sept 20 – Thunder Bay (Northwood) | Internet Services - Outage (Fix in Progress)
